coverage_details.checkup: Not Covered. Exception: Checkup approved up to SR 2,000 for 20 VIP members, list to be provided by HR.
coverage_details.vaccination: Covered up to Annual Limit as per MOH schedule. Hajj & seasonal vaccination, meningococcal, influenza, HPV, and epidemic control covered.
coverage_details.optical_frame: Frame limit: SR 400 as part of Optical Limit
coverage_details.organ_transplant: Covered for live and artificial organs (e.g., heart, liver, kidney, hip, knee) up to policy maximum, excluding cost of organ itself and donor expenses except donation operation for donor. Bone marrow, corneal, joint, and disc replacement covered.
coverage_details.dental_general: Cleaning once per year. Emergency: SR 1,200 (0% deductible). Corrective: SR 1,800 (Nil deductible).
coverage_details.maternity: SR 20,000.00. Applies to female married employees.
coverage_details.optical: SR 1,000.00 (includes multi focal and multi coated lenses, excludes contact lenses)
coverage_details.screening: Covered up to Annual Limit. Mammogram screening covered if medically justified. Freestyle libre reader and sensor covered as recommended.
coverage_details.physiotherapy: Covered up to annual limit when prescribed for covered medical conditions
coverage_details.approval_preauthorization_notes: No pre-authorization required for VIP scheme except specified outpatient services with limits (see policy).
coverage_details.special_instructions: Non-life-threatening congenital cases covered up to policy maximum. Long-term chronic/pre-existing medications covered minimum 3 months per consult. Comprehensive alternative medicine and physiotherapy coverage. Bandages, diabetes monitoring devices (like Freestyle Libre), vitamins, herbal drugs, and other medical supplies/devices covered as recommended. Breast reconstruction in cancer, natural menopause changes, hormone tests, minimally invasive/robotic surgery, decompression therapy, speech therapy for under 7 years (and older if medically prescribed), sports accidents (excluding hazardous sports), deviated septum, and overseas care in Bahrain, Jordan (20%), UAE (co-insurance applies), Lebanon (20% coinsurance, difference settled by patient). Maternity covered for female married employees and newborns outside KSA (subject to Iqama). Nebulizer (SR 300), nebulizer & glucometer (SR 750 PPPY), prosthetics and medical aids covered. Wheelchairs (non-electronic) up to SR 1,000. Physical aids and all necessary medical equipment/devices covered when medically required and as part of treatment. Skin/disease/allergy treatments and tests covered. Medication limit equals pre-authorization approval limit. Special network providers subject to 20% coinsurance up to SR 250.

coverage_details.vaccination: Covered up to Annual Limit as per MOH schedule. Includes Hajj & seasonal vaccination, meningococcal, influenza, HPV, and epidemic control.
coverage_details.optical_frame: Frame limit: SR 400 as part of Optical Limit
coverage_details.organ_transplant: Covered for live and artificial organs up to policy max. Excluding organ cost itself and donor expenses except donation operation for donor. Covers bone marrow, cornea, joint, disc replacement.
coverage_details.dental_general: Cleaning once per year. Emergency: SR 1,200 (0% deductible). Corrective: SR 1,800 (Nil deductible).
coverage_details.maternity: SR 20,000.00. Applies to female married employees.
coverage_details.optical: SR 1,000.00 (multi focal and multi coated lenses, excludes contact lenses, settlement on actual cost up to limit)
coverage_details.screening: Covered up to Annual Limit. Mammogram test screening covered if medically justified. Freestyle libre reader and sensor covered as recommended.
coverage_details.physiotherapy: Covered up to annual limit when prescribed
coverage_details.approval_preauthorization_notes: No pre-authorization required for Parent VIP except as outlined. Overseas care coinsurance applies as per policy.
coverage_details.special_instructions: See VIP notes (nearly identical); includes all alternative medicine and chronic/prescribed supplies. Overseas treatment in Bahrain (coinsurance), Jordan (20%), UAE (coinsurance), Lebanon (20% coinsurance plus any cost difference). Diabetes monitoring devices, prosthetics, hearing aids, allergy tests, skin care, full physiotherapy, sports accident coverage (excluding hazardous sports), etc. Special network providers subject to 20% coinsurance up to SR 250.

coverage_details.special_instructions: See Parent VIP notes for included benefits, procedures, supplies, and overseas coverage. Non-electronic wheelchair up to SR 1,000, nebulizer machine for asthma up to SR 300 per policy period, and combined nebulizer/glucometer up to SR 750.
